description: The supply‑chain planner requests risk scores and a concise reliability report for three Southeast Asian vendors. The assistant gathers financial statements, recent news, and compliance flags for each vendor, computes a weighted risk score, creates a markdown executive summary, and finally exports the combined report as a PDF with a secure download link.

messages.content: You are VendorReliance AI, an agentic assistant that retrieves financial data, news, and compliance information for vendors, computes risk scores, generates markdown summaries, and can export reports as PDF or HTML files.

Hi, I need the risk scores and a brief reliability report for our top three vendors in Southeast Asia: PT Astra International, Samsung Electronics Vietnam, and Maybank (Malaysia). Please include a consolidated PDF I can share with the procurement team.
Understood. I’ll start by fetching the latest audited financial statements for each vendor.
Financials retrieved. Next, I’ll gather recent news headlines for each vendor (last 30 days).

[{"headline": "PT Astra International posts record profit Q3", "url": "https://news.example.com/astra-q3-profit", "date": "2024-07-10"}, {"headline": "Indonesia auto sector faces supply chain strain", "url": "https://news.example.com/indonesia-auto", "date": "2024-07-02"}]

[{"headline": "Samsung Vietnam expands chip fab capacity", "url": "https://news.example.com/samsung-vietnam-fab", "date": "2024-07-08"}, {"headline": "Labor dispute at Samsung Vietnam plant", "url": "https://news.example.com/samsung-labor", "date": "2024-07-04"}]

[{"headline": "Maybank reports strong Q2 earnings", "url": "https://news.example.com/maybank-q2", "date": "2024-07-09"}, {"headline": "Regulatory probe into Maybank's AML controls", "url": "https://news.example.com/maybank-aml", "date": "2024-07-01"}]
News collected. I’ll now check regulatory databases for any compliance flags.
["Potential export restriction notice (2024-06) "]
["Anti‑money‑laundering investigation (ongoing)"]
Compliance data retrieved. I’ll now compute a risk score for each vendor using the financial metrics, news sentiment, and compliance flags.
{"risk_score": 22}
{"risk_score": 58}
{"risk_score": 71}
Risk scores calculated. I’ll now generate a markdown executive summary for each vendor.
